/*특정회원 수정*/ UPDATE members
mbr_pw = #{memberPw},
mbr_name = #{memberName},
mbr_grd = #{memberLevel},
mbr_addr = #{memberAddress},
mbr_daddr = #{memberDAddress},
mbr_zip = #{memberZip},
mbr_telno = #{memberTelno},
mbr_email = #{memberEmail},
where mbr_id = #{memberId};
mapper.select: /* 아이디 중복 체크 */ select count(*) from members m where m.mbr_id =#{memberId};

/* 특정회원 조회 */ select m.mbr_id, m.mbr_pw, m.mbr_name, m.mbr_grd, cc.comm_nm, m.mbr_addr, m.mbr_daddr, m.mbr_zip, m.mbr_telno, m.mbr_email, m.mbr_reg_date from members m inner join comm_code cc on m.mbr_grd = cc.comm_cd where m.mbr_id = #{memberId};

/*회원목록조회*/ select m.mbr_id, m.mbr_pw, m.mbr_name, m.mbr_grd, cc.comm_nm, m.mbr_addr, m.mbr_daddr, m.mbr_zip, m.mbr_telno, m.mbr_email, m.mbr_reg_date from members m inner join comm_code cc on m.mbr_grd = cc.comm_cd order by cast(substring_index(m.mbr_id,'ksmartid',-1) as unsigned);
